alert.note: Alert for Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 24 at 4:17AM EST until January 24 at 11:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST /10 AM CST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Widespread visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Ohio, all of northern Indiana and far southwest Lower Michigan. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST /10 AM CST/ today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will provide temporary improvement with the foggy conditions before a more widespread fog improvement by noon. The dense fog is expected to redevelop tonight with another Dense Fog Advisory likely to be issued.
info.instruction: If you are driving early today, slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. Watch out for children that may be waiting near the road for the school bus.

area.areaDesc: Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph
